scripts.build: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.clean: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run clean); done
scripts.lint: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run lint); done
scripts.typecheck: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run typecheck); done
scripts.test: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run test); done
